005B1E9E.VoiceDir5.F1C75: Derin is wounded and pained, but still makes an effort to comfort Mateen's panic.

1862B7FF.Line7.123237: Easy, I’ll help you to the healer, eh?

6898E3CC.VoiceDir7.123237: Less panicked than before. He's more concerned about Derin's condition than his own feelings.

8ED7BAB9.Line1.123237: Oh, I... I can’t believe it. I... if I knew he lived, I... I would have gathered a group... oh, I never should have run.

9151B871.Line5.F1C75: (cough) It’s okay, Mateen. I just want to leave this place.

DF0DE686.VoiceDir1.123237: Bewildered. Mixed emotions of relief, anxiety, and panic. He's relieved Derin is alive, but is also worried Derin will blame him for leaving Derin behind.

F0E661C1.Line9.123237: Thank you, wanderer. You’re braver than most. Akarat must guide your path.

FB3FFC35.MenuLabel: “I found your lost friend alive. He needs to be taken to a healer.”
